Section Five - The Spirit of Unity
[PORTIONS OF THE
TRACT, SPECIAL TESTIMONIES, SERIES B,
NO. 4, ARE INCLUDED IN THIS SECTION.]

                                  "That they all may be one." 
                                   John 17:21. 


        Unity Among Different Nationalities [ADDRESS 
        DELIVERED AT THE EUROPEAN UNION COUNCIL, 
        BASEL, SWITZERLAND, SEPTEMBER 24, 1885.] 


     "If any man thirst, let him come unto Me, and drink." "Whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life." John 7:37; 4:14.
